solution_line_template: Rupert is younger than Vincent by {rupert_age_difference_from_vincent} years, so he is {vincent_age} years old - {rupert_age_difference_from_vincent} years = <<{vincent_age}-{rupert_age_difference_from_vincent}={rupert_age}>>{rupert_age} years old.
Khloe is {khloe_age_difference_from_rupert} years younger than Rupert so she is {rupert_age} years old - {khloe_age_difference_from_rupert} years = {khloe_age} years old.

Eugene is {eugene_age_multiplier_from_khloe} times older than Khloe so he is {khloe_age} years old * {eugene_age_multiplier_from_khloe} = <<{khloe_age}*{eugene_age_multiplier_from_khloe}={eugene_age}>>{eugene_age} years old.
Yorick is twice Eugene's age so he is {eugene_age} years old * {yorick_age_multiplier_from_eugene} = <<{eugene_age}*{yorick_age_multiplier_from_eugene}={yorick_age}>>{yorick_age} years old.
Amilia is a quarter of Yorick's age so she is {yorick_age} years old / {amilia_age_divisor_from_yorick} = <<{yorick_age}/{amilia_age_divisor_from_yorick}={amilia_age}>>{amilia_age} years old.
Tricia is a third of Amilia's age so she is {amilia_age} years old / {tricia_age_divisor_from_amilia} = <<{amilia_age}/{tricia_age_divisor_from_amilia}={tricia_age}>>{tricia_age} years old.
